title: Facebook : annual revenue 2009 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 70697.0 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 777.0 was reported at Year 2009
